Title: Divorce Texas Style
Writer: Melrose Fougere, Yankie Grant, Melody Moss, Mike Vance
Actors: Daniel Baldwin, Melody Moss, Marshall R. Teague, Yankie Grant
Plot: DIVORCE TEXAS STYLE is about four men, four women and a Texas legend that says: if somebody wants a divorce in Texas, someone has to die. With two detectives hot on their trail, the four ...
